title: this is my Game chat Learn form it how not to be banned

replies.body: Another keyboard warrior gets it ðŸ˜‚

What i'm reading is quality English...

You might want to learn how to speak/type before you try and justify your ban on boards lmao

Hahaha You are Correct my Spelling Is horrible Dyslexia and other problem Cause bad spelling Sorry 
Yes am a keyboard warrior its true But my points still stand thank you for taken a look not sure if you learned anything or not.

I was banned Cuz of me raging I was raging because of Riots bad match making game 1  
And player Wasting my time and refusing to communicate to win because they feared being Banned so instead of use working out problem and turning the game around they just let the game become a loss and aimed to Report. Game 2

what you can learn from this is to disable all chat be a toxic asshole and you get reward Play broken champions And dont trust anyone else I hit silver 3 But if you are an asshole enough And show your team 0 respect am sure you can hit diamond Just rember op champ follow the meta and dont try and use skill Or team work. Focues on carrying games solo and getting honers from your team I wasted my time as a support main Healing and shilding and helping Next time Ill go full jg prob get to gold
